Trade/Device Name(s): Light Diagnostics HSV 1/2 Typing DFA Kit
Specimen Type(s): Direct specimens from patients with vesicular lesions
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Fluorescence microscope with 100 watt mercury or halogen lamp, FITC filter set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Light Diagnostics HSV 1/2 Typing DFA Kit using direct immunofluorescence assay to qualitatively detect and identify HSV-1 and HSV-2 in patient specimens and cell cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and identification of herpes simplex virus type 1 and/or type 2 in direct specimens from patients with vesicular lesions and symptoms of herpes infection, and for culture confirmation by immunofluorescence.
